short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes it easy to see which hours are released

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When inspecting your hours, click the button within the extension -> hours are now marked green for released hours, and yellow for any hours not released, and white if no hours registered
